assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Anant Raj Limited primarily develops and constructs information and technology parks, hospitality projects, special economic zones, office complexes, shopping malls, and residential projects in Delhi, Haryana, Rajasthan, and the National Capital Region in India. The company also leases and rents commercial properties. The company was formerly known as Anant Raj Industries Limited and changed its name to Anant Raj Limited in October 2012. Anant Raj Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
